data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Seeman, Owen D., Lindquist, Evert E., Husband, Robert W. (2018): A new tribe of tarsonemid mites (Trombidiformes: Heterostigmatina) parasitic on tetrigid grasshoppers (Orthoptera). Zootaxa 4418 (1): 1-54, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4418.1.1|16 occurrences
